pages.css: <style>.Banner-box { position: fixed; bottom: 0; left: 0; z-index: 10; width: calc(100% - 32px); padding: 16px 16px; background: white; box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 0px rgb(204 204 204 / 80%); } .Banner-content { margin-bottom: 16px; width: 100%; } .Banner-content-description { font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13px; line-height: 21px; text-align: left; } .Banner-accept-button { box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; width: fit-content; padding: 2px 16px; border-radius: 4px; background-color: #0078d4; color: #fff; text-decoration: none; text-align: center; font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-size: 13px; line-height: 21px; cursor: pointer; border: none; margin: 4px 5px; } .Banner-decline-button { box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; width: fit-content; padding: 2px 16px; border-radius: 4px; background-color: #0078d4; color: #fff; text-decoration: none; text-align: center; font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-size: 13px; line-height: 21px; cursor: pointer; border: none; margin: 4px 5px; } .Banner-customize-button { color: #0078d4; cursor: pointer; background-color: transparent; font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-size: 13px; line-height: 21px; margin: 4px 5px; width: fit-content; text-align: center; } .Banner-model-buttonactions { display: flex; flex-direction: row; width: 100%; align-items: center; } .Banner-model-primary-buttons { display: flex; flex-direction: row; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .Banner-model-buttonactions { flex-direction: column; } .Banner-accept-button { width: calc(100% - 32px); } .Banner-decline-button { width: calc(100% - 32px); } .Banner-customize-button { width: calc(100% - 32px); } .Banner-content-description { text-align: center; } }</style>

font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 13px; line-height: 21px } .Preferences-tracker-category-description { font-family: "Segoe UI"; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; display: flex; font-style: normal; font-weight: 600; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; display: flex } .Preferences-close-box { cursor: pointer; position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; margin-top: 10px; margin-right: 10px } .Preferences-categories { margin-bottom: 25px;
